item.title: Need help With wilderness
item.dc:creator: @boy53663 boy53663
item.description:
@boy53663 wrote:

alright. atm everywhere except lumbridge and some over places are in the wilderness.

I want to make the wilderness only in the wilderness

I know it has somethin to do with these codes but i donâ€™t understand them

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; } } return false; }
